hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies

introduction.title: What Are Cookies
introduction.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

items.essential: Ensure the platform functions correctly (essential cookies)
items.preferences: Remember your language and interface preferences
items.analytics: Understand how users interact with our platform (analytics cookies)
items.security: Enhance security and prevent fraudulent activity
items.performance: Improve website performance and loading times

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These are necessary for the website to function. They enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and language preferences. These cookies cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.content: These enhance functionality and personalization, such as remembering your language choice and interface preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These help us understand how visitors use our website by collecting anonymous information. This helps us improve our services.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: We may use these to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness (if applicable).

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies, such as:
thirdParty.note: These third parties have their own privacy policies regarding cookie usage.

control.title: Managing Cookies
control.content: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

items.browser: Browser settings: Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies through their settings
items.preferences: Platform preferences: Use our cookie preferences center (if available)
items.optout: Third-party opt-outs: Visit the websites of third-party providers to opt out of their cookies

control.warning: Please note that disabling certain cookies may impact the functionality of our platform.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Please review this page periodically for the latest information on our cookie practices.
